main event: A large and or pencil-shaped object was seen stationary in the sky and gradually faded out over a period of three minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 45 degrees to the south., The sighting lasted for three minutes., The observer speculated that the object may have been the exhaust from a jet aircraft., Weather conditions were thin overcast with excellent visibility., The object appeared as a red light and was reported to be stationary before its gradual fade-out.
